titleStmt.title: Two letters sent to the Honorable William Lenthall Esq: Speaker of the honourable house of Commons, concerning the seige at Bristoll and the taking the strong fort, with seven peices of ordnance: also the taking of Sir Bernard Ashley, where was killed Colonell Daniell, and Sir. Rich. Craine deadly wounded. Which letters were appointed to be printed by the honourable William Lenthall Esq; Speaker of the House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Lenthall, William, 1591-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.W. for Ed. Husband, printer for the Honourable House of Commons.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
